Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the Governor and New York State Legislature to execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 New York State Brownfield Cleanup Program and distribution of funding through the Brownfield Opportunity Areas Program.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Execute the Memorandum of Understanding required for the implementation of the landmark 2003 NYS Brownfield Cleanup Program.
